projectGridLines.title: Researching new product development
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Will be working at the factory to research on chemical composition for new

products.

Skill sets: Excel, Documentation, Consumer Psychology, knowledge of chemistry, interpersonal

skills

Traits expectation: Hardworking, research oriented

Expected learning: How to develop new products for a frugal startup

Specific courses required for project execution: Organisational psychology, International

Relations, Current Affairs, Security ad Portfolio Management, EVS, Business Analysis and

Valuation, Financial Management, DChemical Engineer
